mapper.update:
update GEMSDEV.USER_INFO
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_LOGIN_IP = #{currentLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_ATTEMPT_TIMES = #{loginAttemptTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOGIN_FAILD_TIME = #{loginFaildTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PASSWORD_FIRST_MODIFIED_FLAG = #{passwordFirstModifiedFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSWORD_EXPIRE_TIME = #{passwordExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LANGUAGE_ID = #{languageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMEZONE_ID = #{timezoneId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIMEZONE_CODE = #{timezoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE_NUM = #{telephoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POSITION_CLASSIFY_CODE = #{positionClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BD_UNIT_ID = #{bdUnitId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BD_ORG_ID = #{bdOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FM_ORG_ID = #{fmOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADM_ORG_ID = #{admOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VENDOR_CODE = #{vendorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_NO = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RECHG_FLAG = #{isRechgFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
USING_FLAG = #{usingFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENCODE = #{encode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRED_TIME = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PASSPORT_NO = #{passportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAVE_IMAGE_FLAG = #{haveImageFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
LEADER_ID = #{leaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HAVE_PHOTO_FLAG = #{havePhotoFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CLASSIFY_LEVEL = #{classifyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAP_ORDER = #{sapOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUERY_SELF_FLAG = #{querySelfFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION_FLAG = #{versionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PASSPORT_EXPIRED_DATE = #{passportExpiredDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HR_CODE = #{hrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HR_NAME = #{hrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_IMAGE = #{signImage,jdbcType=BLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
